forum.name: updates
forum.description: find out what's new with anylad. feature announcements and bug fix info. thanks all!
forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: More Lag Info

comments.text: Hi all! Version 165.7 (you're on [version]) adds some new info to name tags if you turned on Me -> ... -> "Show Body Part Counts". Thx Sloppy & everyone!
You'll now also see the script messages per second this person sends, and whether or not they're area syncing authority. (More info is on the Steam forum!)
Our realtime servers give us 500 msgs/s (movement needs to be sent as well) and anything above can cause lag & crashes.
Note high msgs/s may not be related to the person's body if they're sync authority, it may also mean ...
... that the area has a high # of "when is/ then is" variable changes or animations on persisting/ variable-using parts.
You can now also find the new msgs/s info on the back of your profile dialog.
We want to look further into auto-capping high # of messages, but hopefully these new stats give you some more insight into possible area lag!

thread.latestCommentText: We want to look further into auto-capping high amounts of messages, but hopefully this new stats info gives you some more insight into possible area lag.
